email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 03/07/2001 01:00 PM --------------------------- TIM HEIZENRADER 03/05/2001 09:06 AM To: Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Tim Belden/HOU/ECT@ECT, Chris Gaskill/Corp/Enron@Enron Subject: Revised Long Range Hydro Forecast Phillip: Here's a summary of our current forecast(s) for PNW hydro. Please give me a call when you have time, and I'll explain the old BiOp / new BiOp issue. Tim
